relation: Move to the next focusable element within editor area
Up Arrow, Down Arrow, Left Arrow, Right Arrow
pageTitle: Working with the Oracle ADF Skin Editor
textBeforeTable: Table 3-26 Keyboard Navigation for Canvas Areas of Graphical Editors The following table describes the keyboard actions to perform navigation tasks involving the canvas areas of graphical editors. Alt+Page Down Move from page to next page Alt+Page Up Move from page to previous page Ctrl+Shift+Tab Navigate backward in or out of editor Ctrl-Tab Navigate forward in or out of editor Keys Navigation Table 3-25 Keyboard Navigation for Graphical Editors The following table describes the keyboard actions to perform navigation tasks involving graphical editors. Graphical Editors Ctrl-V Paste selected text Ctrl-X Cut selection Ctrl-C Copy selection Ctrl+Shift+Page Up/Ctrl+Shift+Page Down
textAfterTable: Scripting on this page enhances content navigation, but does not change the content in any way.
